title: Jet2holidays Expands Indulgent Escapes and Jet2CityBreaks CollectionsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Jet2holidays Expands Indulgent Escapes and Jet2CityBreaks Collections  
Jet2holidays has launched new editions of its popular Indulgent Escapes and Jet2CityBreaks brochures for winter 2015/summer 2016, offering brand new hotels and stunning new destinations.
 
Jet2holidays Indulgent Escapes Brochure: 
It showcases the leading package holiday specialist’s biggest luxury collection yet with 66 handpicked five-star hotels. There are 14 new properties including the stunning Hotel Puente Romano in Marbella. Resorts in Antalya and Malta have also been introduced for the very first time, giving those who enjoy a high-end holiday even greater choice.
 
A host of extra touches have also been introduced to ensure customers have a truly indulgent and relaxing experience. Included as standard are: a complimentary drink onboard, fast track security, a generous 22kg luggage allowance plus private resort transfers.
 
Jet2CityBreaks Brochure: 
This latest edition has even more world-famous capitals for people to take their pick from, including two new cities: Naples and Rotterdam. There is also a range of special one-off Christmas market breaks to some of the most magical places in Europe, including new destinations Berlin and Copenhagen, plus the hugely popular and successful New York shopping trips. Return flights and hotel are included in Jet2CityBreaks packages and FREE 22kg hold baggage is available on bookings to select destinations.
Steve Heapy, CEO of Jet2.com and Jet2holidays said: “We are continually looking to expand and enhance our holiday products so agents have the very best range of options for their customers. Our new Indulgent Escapes and Jet2CityBreaks brochures feature a terrific selection of carefully selected hotels that will not disappoint. Add to that all the Jet2holidays extra touches, I’m confident these updated collections will prove to be very popular for those in the market for either a luxury escape, a short city break or both!”
 
Source:-Jet2holidays
